    Positive
  </StatusIndicatorInline>
  <StatusIndicatorInline type="informational" style={style}>
    Informational
  </StatusIndicatorInline>
  <StatusIndicatorInline type="warning" style={style}>
    Warning
  </StatusIndicatorInline>
  <StatusIndicatorInline type="negative" style={style}>
    Negative
  </StatusIndicatorInline>
</div>;
